title: ClinGen Code of Conduct
subtitle: Applies to any member of the ClinGen community, including but not limited to staff, volunteers, invited experts, and participants in ClinGen activities.
intro: ClinGen's Code of Conduct aims to define and promote high standards of professional practice. The Code of Conduct applies to any member of the ClinGen community, including but not limited to staff, volunteers, invited experts, and participants in ClinGen activities. These policies cover participant conduct both internal and external to ClinGen that is currently affecting or highly likely to affect ClinGen efforts. ClinGen expects all of its participants to adhere to the expected behaviors detailed in the Code of Conduct and to not engage in prohibited behaviors.

sections.title: Help us create a professional environment:
bullets: Commit to high standards of objectivity and transparency

sections.title: Avoid hostile and unprofessional behavior:
bullets: Reproducing materials, photographing, or recording without consent
